banner.title: FEATURES
banner.description: We make sure all of our features are designed to be loved by every aspiring and even professional photograpers who wanted to share their stories.

calltoaction.title: We're in beta. Get your invite today!

features.title: 100% Responsive
features.description: No matter which the device you're on, our site is fully responsive and stories look beautiful on any screen.

features.title: No Photo Upload Limit
features.description: Our tool has no limits on uploads or bandwidth. Freely upload in bulk and share all of your stories in one go.

features.title: Available to Embed
features.description: Embed Tweets, Facebook posts, Instagram media, Vimeo or YouTube videos, Google Maps, and more.

features.title: Custom Domain
features.description: With Photosnap subscriptions you can host your stories on your own domain. You can also remove our branding!

features.title: Boost Your Exposure
features.description: Users that viewed your story or gallery can easily get notifed of new and featured stories with our built in mailing list.

features.title: Drag & Drop icon
features.description: Easily drag and drop your icon and get beautiful shots everytime. No over the top tooling to add friction to creating stories.
